ygData.subject: Re: My Experience With a Level 2 Cleric
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh youre only a level 2 :) Theres a lot more to a cleric than that oh 30 mana you have then.  Like me, at level 28, i have about 850 mana, so i can heal a
ygData.messageBody:
Heh youre only a level 2 :) Theres a lot more to a cleric than that oh 30 mana you have then. Like me, at level 28, i have about 850 mana, so i can heal a pretty number of HPs :)
Allsar Olath`Vlos - 28th rank - Rathe
-----Original Message-----
From: bigmack <bigmack@...>
To: EQ-clerics@onelist.com <EQ-clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, August 22, 1999 5:58 PM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] My Experience With a Level 2 Cleric


I just created a Cleric today and got him up to level 2. At the guild shop I noticed so many classes of spells...attack spells, healings spells, and other spells were all handled by different NPC's. I'll be spending A LOT of money on spells. I do have a minor gripe with clerics, though. They just don't have enough total mana, and the Minor Healing spell isn't strong enough. I was grouped up with a Warrior and after wasting all of my mana healing him four times, only half of his health had grown back. Clerics need more mana! What do you think?

Albus the Cleric, on The Tribunal Server
